label: Walking Tours
description: Guided walking tours focused on history, food, and cultural heritage.

faqs.question: How long are walking tours?
faqs.answer: Most walking tours last 3 to 3.5 hours.

faqs.question: Is food included in the Food Walking Tour?

tours.name: Downtown Rio on Foot: Selarón Steps & Hidden Gems
tours.description: Discover downtown Rio's architectural treasures and colonial history on this guided walking tour.

tours.name: Rio Food Walking Tour: Authentic Brazilian Culinary Experience
tours.description: Taste your way through Rio's culinary heritage with 8-10 traditional Brazilian dishes and drinks.

tours.name: Little Africa: Rio's Soul & African Heritage Unveiled
tours.description: Explore Rio's profound African heritage through the historic port district where African culture shaped Brazilian identity.
